name: Othovir

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
text: Othovir is a gifted harness-maker who doesn't talk about his family or where he came from. He cares about his business, his clients, and his good name.
Ideal: "Find what you do well, and do it to the best of your ability."
Bond: "I won't allow my name to be tarnished."
Flaw: "I get angry when others pry into my private life."

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: Othovir is a 2nd-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following sorcerer spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): blade ward, fire bolt, mending, prestidigitation

action.name: Rapier
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: Othovir adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Othovir must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
